s: Markwins Beauty Brands is a global leader in health and beauty and the largest independent cosmetics company in the USA. For over 35 years, we have been at the forefront of cosmetic innovation and behind some of the industry’s most enduring trends.

June 26, 2024 - Right after last year’s Happi ... CEO of Markwins Beauty Brands (MBB) passed away at the age of 63. The company said the cause of death was a respiratory illness. Born in Taiwan, Chen founded the privately-held City of Industry, CA-based company 37 years ago. He created The Color Workshop and The Color Institute before acquiring a raft of brands such as Wet ‘n’ Wild, Physicians Formula, Black Radiance, Bonnie Bell, Lip Smacker and POP.
